title: Just the Two of Us
description: Judge Hodgman rules on indiscriminate hot-saucing, Vegas buffet etiquette, civic responsibility and more. Plus an update on the Brocavores from Episode 167!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
